set(SKYNET_NET_SERVICE_HEADER

    src/service/tcp_client_config.h
    src/service/tcp_client_config.inl
    src/service/tcp_server.h
    src/service/tcp_server_acceptor_config.h
    src/service/tcp_server_acceptor_config.inl
    src/service/tcp_server_session_config.h
    src/service/tcp_server_session_config.inl
    src/service/udp_client.h
    src/service/udp_server.h
)
set(SKYNET_NET_SERVICE_SRC
    src/service/tcp_client.cpp
    src/service/tcp_server.cpp
    src/service/udp_client.cpp
    src/service/udp_server.cpp
    src/service/network.cpp
)
